name: Pinoy Hatdog
text: There's also HOOQ. Never tried any of them, but I hear HOOQ has "Friends", so that's a plus! But in the end, you'll have to have good internet to take advantage of it.

source_obj.text: There's also HOOQ. Never tried any of them, but I hear HOOQ has "Friends", so that's a plus! But in the end, you'll have to have good internet to take advantage of it.
